name: HospitalRadio
0:
”Alexa, Open Hospital Radio”
”Alexa, Play Hospital Radio”
”Alexa, Start Hospital Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hospital radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Hospital Radio Ireland! Tune in to enjoy non-stop music, news, and entertainment from our dedicated station. Simply say:

“Alexa, play Hospital Radio.”
“Alexa, open Hospital Radio.”
“Alexa, start Hospital Radio.”
Start streaming now for a fantastic listening experience!

Example Phrases
“Alexa, open Hospital Radio.”
“Alexa, play Hospital Radio .”
“Alexa, ask Hospital Radio to start.”
Category
Music & Audio

Keywords
Hospital, Radio, Ireland, music, local radio, live stream
